posts.post_title: C1911 Comic Baseball Postcard Lot - SOLD
posts.post_content: Lot of 5 different comic baseball postcards $35.00 ppd.  PayPal Friends & Family to [url]JSRNA@AOL.COM[/url].  Confirm purchase before sending funds.  Thank you.  Jim

Email sent. I'll take them if they are still available.

Doug

[quote name="doug.goodman" post=2083824]Email sent. I'll take them if they are still available.

Doug[/QUOTE]

Hi Doug...Their yours!  Thank you.  Jim
The last one is how my lovely wife "helps" me to clean the house...
